# UCE INSIGHT
[color=#a4885c]Hull Configuration:[/color] Medium, Port and Starboard Docking, Aft Cargo Hanger
[color=#a4885c]Crew Slots:[/color] 1 Captain, 1 Researcher, 1 Paramedic, 2 Salvage Techs
[color=#a4885c]Power System:[/color] 2x SUPERPACMAN Uranium Generators
[color=#a4885c]Atmospherics:[/color] Gas Mixer, Premixed Air Connector
[color=#a4885c]IFF Designation:[/color] Civilian (Science)
"Manufactured by the Ursadine Collective, the Insight is an artifact research and wreck salvage vessel."
